title: I didnt get premium hextech chests
body: Hi. I didnt get premium hextect chests after reaching level 5. Im level 10 almost, played alot of blind picks. I did get hextech chest from getting S rank on some champion and managed to get honor capsule, but I didnt see premium hextech chest like my friend :/ .

replies.body: Hey there, indeed it doesn't look like you received the new player chest.  It's been added now, thanks for being patient with it!
I also did not get a chest pls help for reaching lvl 5
